component.name: Mozilla VPN
component.summary: A fast, secure and easy to use VPN. Built by the makers of Firefox

description.p: A virtual private network protects your connection to the internet, keeping your location and what you do online more private across your devices.

p.em: Keeps your data safe on public Wi-Fi

description.p: Log in to your bank or doctor's office from the airport, cafe or anywhere, with peace of mind.
Hide your activity from trackers and malware so you can shop without being watched.
Check out streaming media, websites and live-streams from other countries while you're traveling or at home.

p.em: Features that protect your life online

ul.li: Fast network speeds even while gaming
No logging, tracking or sharing of network data
Extra security: whole device protection, multi-hop routing and more
